headline: UK rolls out free AI training, but will it save your job?
summary: Free artificial intelligence training is being made available to everyone in the UK as the government steps up efforts to prepare the workforce for rapid technological change.  From today, adults can access short, practical courses through the government's upgraded AI Skills Hub, designed to help people use AI tools in the workplace.  The training covers everyday tasks such as drafting text, creating content, and automating administrative work - with some courses taking less than 20 minutes to complete.

raw.headline: UK rolls out free AI training, but will it save your job?

The training covers everyday tasks such as drafting text, creating content, and automating administrative work - with some courses taking less than 20 minutes to complete.

headline: Sol Digital Enlists Former Rizing President Carl Graves for Next Phase of Growth
summary: Sol Digital, LLC, a technology-focused consulting and talent solutions partner, announced today that Carl Graves has joined the company as its third Managing Partner. Mr. Graves joins Kaan Aslansan and Daniel Gavula in Sol's senior leadership team as the firm enters a new phase of growth, scale, and operational maturity.
